author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Markdig.Signed](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig) from 0.17.0 to 0.17.1.
Changelog *Sourced from [Markdig.Signed's changelog](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/blob/master/changelog.md).* > ## 0.17.1 (04 July 2019) > - Fix regression when escaping HTML characters ([(PR [#340](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/340))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/340)) > - Update Emoji Dictionary ([(PR [#346](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/346))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/346)) >
Commits - [`f3f7584`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/f3f7584c399b02422f69081709a9f0b9f0e17881) Bump to 0.17.1 - [`d00ca4a`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d00ca4acc1e72ee1141883d26de9231d67eccbc7) Add coverage badge to readme.readme.md - [`d9663ef`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d9663ef2e606bce46aa9888fa4dd95eff6a50a22) Try to upload to coveralls.io - [`3106a49`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/3106a49d02f65b15f9a1dc7d8a2ace1b700a1ed1) Merge pull request [#352](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/352) from MihaZupan/master - [`a47a689`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/a47a6890e71e938c23764e77db42decd27133484) Remove coverage report from source control - [`7d21f8b`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/7d21f8b00356a2a2ccdf9427f6cf4522f4ce9463) Add test code coverage - [`15f6205`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/15f6205adc967cca4cf1a5f3efb2bc7ecec4e368) Ensure line ending diffs don't trigger spec regeneration - [`e6dd2cf`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/e6dd2cf3d4b3d3f723f247843e178dbda8cdd416) Cleanup build configuration - [`ea6592b`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/ea6592b773def5e430b3af7c08ff774e9dc94c3e) Merge pull request [#346](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/346) from kelvindules/update-emoji-dictionary - [`5cd20ef`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/5cd20efe3e5eac22e672850a35e8f4c6520156d8) Removed duplicates - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/compare/0.17.0...0.17.1)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.17.0&new-version=0.17.1)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.17.0&new-version=0.17.1) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it). To ignore the version in this PR you can just close it - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.
